Interface FileRepository

All Known Implementing Classes:
LocalFileRepository
public interface FileRepository
Interface for file repository operations. Defines methods for CRUD operations on files and directories.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    create(Path directory, String filename)
    Creates a new file in the specified directory.

    Deletes a file from the specified directory.

    Checks if a path is a directory.

    Reads the content of a file.

  • Method Details

    • create

      void create(Path directory, String filename) throws FileAlreadyExistsException, IllegalArgumentException, UnknowException
      Creates a new file in the specified directory.
      Parameters:
      directory - the directory path
      filename - the name of the file to create
      Throws:
      FileAlreadyExistsException - if the file already exists
      IllegalArgumentException - if the filename is invalid
      UnknowException - for any other errors

    • createRepository

      void createRepository(Path directory, String directoryName) throws IllegalArgumentException, UnknowException, FileAlreadyExistsException
      Creates a new directory.
      Parameters:
      directory - the parent directory path
      directoryName - the name of the directory to create
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the directory name is invalid
      UnknowException - for any other errors
      FileAlreadyExistsException - if the directory already exists

    • delete

      void delete(Path directory, String filename) throws FileNotFoundException, IllegalArgumentException, UnknowException
      Deletes a file from the specified directory.
      Parameters:
      directory - the directory path
      filename - the name of the file to delete
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - if the file does not exist
      IllegalArgumentException - if the filename is invalid
      UnknowException - for any other errors

    • read

      String read(Path directory, String filename) throws FileNotFoundException, FileNotReadableException, IllegalArgumentException, UnknowException
      Reads the content of a file.
      Parameters:
      directory - the directory path
      filename - the name of the file to read
      Returns:
      the content of the file
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - if the file does not exist
      FileNotReadableException - if the file cannot be read
      IllegalArgumentException - if the filename is invalid
      UnknowException - for any other errors

    • listFiles

      String listFiles(Path directoryName) throws IllegalArgumentException, UnknowException
      Lists all files in the specified directory.
      Parameters:
      directoryName - the directory path
      Returns:
      a formatted string of file names
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the directory is invalid
      UnknowException - for any other errors

    • isDirectory

      Boolean isDirectory(Path path) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Checks if a path is a directory.
      Parameters:
      path - the path to check
      Returns:
      true if the path is a directory, false otherwise
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the path is invalid

    • update

      String update(Path directory, String filename, String newContent) throws FileNotFoundException, FileNotReadableException, IllegalArgumentException, UnknowException
      Updates the content of a file.
      Parameters:
      directory - the directory path
      filename - the name of the file to update
      newContent - the new content for the file
      Returns:
      a success message
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - if the file does not exist
      FileNotReadableException - if the file cannot be read
      IllegalArgumentException - if the filename is invalid
      UnknowException - for any other errors
